Darkvision.
Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Shocking Resistance.

Deep Legacy.
You know the cantrip shocking grasp. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the grease spell once per day, requiring no material components. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the invisibility spell once on yourself, requiring no material components. You must finish a long rest to cast these spells again with this trait. Intellegence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
